title: How can I prepare to establish a Christ-centered home?
short_title: How can I prepare to establish a Christ-centered home?
content: How can I prepare to establish a Christ-centered home?

Building the kingdom of God begins with building a righteous home and family. The family is the most important unit of the Church. As members of the Church, we should establish a home where the Spirit is present. A Christ-centered home offers us a place of defense against sin, refuge from the world, and committed, genuine love. The Savior asked His followers questions that caused them to think and feel deeply. He trusted them and prepared them. Consider how you will help the young women understand the importance of raising a righteous posterity and preparing to establish Christ-centered homes.

At the beginning of each class, invite the young women to share, teach, and testify about the experiences they have had applying what they learned in the previous week’s lesson. This will encourage personal conversion and help the young women see the relevance of the gospel in their daily lives.
